ValidationRule.description: Resolving a Privacy Case Requires a Resolution Code to be populated as well.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status,"Resolved"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed") ),
ISBLANK(TEXT(Resolution_Code__c)),
OR( $RecordType.DeveloperName = "Privacy_Request", $RecordType.DeveloperName = "Data_Owner_Request", $RecordType.DeveloperName = "Privacy_Request_Read_Only" ),
Supervisor_Data_Validation_Override__c = FALSE
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Resolving a Privacy Case Requires a Resolution Code to be populated as well.
